text: HMB may refer to: ==Compounds== * β-Hydroxy β-methylbutyric acid, , a metabolite of the essential amino acid leucine, synthesized in the human body *Human Melanoma Black, a monoclonal antibody ==Languages== * Humburi Senni language, spoken in Burkina Faso and Mali ==Places== * Half Moon Bay, California, city in the United States ==Sports== * Historical medieval battles, a modern sport ==Other== * Hawkeye Marching Band, the marching band for the University of Iowa * HabibMetro, a Swish multinational bank in Pakistan
title: HMB
